resources.string: OPrime Open Experiment was Android-ified by the iLanguage Lab, Montreal.
Go to the OPrime web site
Special Thanks to the Montreal Computational Linguistics community, and the Android Open Source developers for their work which directly or indirectly contributed to this project.
The Experiments are copyright their original authors, see the Experiment Home screen for details for each Experiment. OPrime Open Experimentation for Android is released under the Apache 2.0 License.
